Item.Description: Holds EDFacts accountability elements for a Local Education Agency.

Description.p: The Id (GUID) that uniquely identifies the Local Education Agency.
The Id (GUID) that identifies the LEA where accountability is being tracked.
An indication of whether the school or local education agency (LEA) submitted a Gun-Free Schools Act (GFSA) of 1994 report to the state, as defined by Title 18, Section 921.
A unique indicator (usually a URL) that points to the codeset used.
